message: anybody knows of an open-source alternative to something like http://www.loggly.com/ or https://papertrailapp.com/ ?
Work in progress, but Sentry should suit that need soon: https://github.com/dcramer/sentry/tree/
I also know Graylog2. It doesn't support alerting but it still looks nice : http://www.graylog2.org/
@zimbatm Looks nice, I'll try it tonight!
You might also look at logstash: http://code.google.com/p/logstash/
It's one of the guys at Loggly's side project. Very splunk-like.
You may want to use my sendmail-syslog project to redirect your local mails (eg. cron) to syslog too. https://github.com/zimbatm/sendmail_syslog
